description.value: You have a knack for mentoring others. Whenever you successfully Aid an ally, you increase the circumstance bonus that you would grant them by +1, or by +2 on a critical success. Whenever an ally @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Follow the Expert]{Follows the Expert}, and the expert they choose to follow is you, the circumstance bonus they gain to their skill check based on your proficiency is increased by +1.
